title: A1 Introduction to React JS
description: This assignment covers the basics of React JS. You will learn how to create components, manage state, and handle events. Submit a GitHub repository link with your React project.

title: A2 State and Props
description: In this assignment, you will dive deeper into React's state and props. You will learn how to pass data between components and manage component state. Submit a zip file containing your React project and a README file.

title: A3 React Lifecycle and Hooks
description: This assignment focuses on React lifecycle methods and hooks. You will learn how to use hooks to manage side effects and lifecycle events. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project implementing React hooks.

title: A1 Introduction to Modern Web Developments
description: Learn the basics of modern web development. Topics include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Submit a project that includes a basic webpage using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: A2 Responsive Design
description: Explore the principles of responsive design and create a website that adapts to various screen sizes. Submit a zip file of your responsive website project.

title: A3 Client-Side Frameworks
description: Introduction to client-side frameworks like React and Angular. Build a small application using one of these frameworks. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project.

title: A1 Advanced React JS Concepts
description: Deep dive into advanced React concepts such as context API and higher-order components. Submit a project demonstrating these concepts with a GitHub repository link.

title: A2 React Router and Navigation
description: Learn to implement routing in React applications using React Router. Create a multi-page application. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project.

title: A3 React with TypeScript
description: Integrate TypeScript into your React projects to enhance type safety. Submit a GitHub repository link with a React project implemented in TypeScript.

title: A1 Introduction to Full Stack Development
description: Learn the basics of full stack development using React and Node.js. Submit a project that includes both frontend and backend code with a GitHub repository link.

title: A2 Backend Development with Node.js
description: Build a RESTful API using Node.js and Express. Submit a GitHub repository link with your backend project.

title: A3 Frontend Development with React
description: Create a dynamic frontend using React to consume the RESTful API built in the previous assignment. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project.

title: A1 Introduction to React Native
description: Learn the fundamentals of React Native for building mobile applications. Submit a GitHub repository link with a simple React Native app.

title: A2 Advanced React Native Concepts
description: Explore advanced concepts in React Native such as navigation and animations. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project demonstrating these concepts.

title: A3 React Native and Native Modules
description: Integrate native modules into your React Native app. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project.

title: A1 Introduction to State Management
description: Understand the basics of state management in React. Implement state management in a small project. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project.

title: A2 Advanced State Management Techniques
description: Learn advanced state management techniques using Redux and Context API. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project demonstrating these techniques.

title: A3 Optimizing State Management
description: Optimize state management for performance in React applications. Submit a GitHub repository link with your optimized project.

title: A1 Introduction to Testing in React
description: Learn the basics of testing in React using tools like Jest and React Testing Library. Submit a GitHub repository link with your tested project.

title: A2 Advanced Testing Techniques
description: Explore advanced testing techniques in React, including integration and end-to-end tests. Submit a GitHub repository link with your project that includes these advanced tests.

title: A3 Debugging React Applications
description: Learn how to debug React applications effectively using tools like React DevTools and Chrome DevTools. Submit a GitHub repository link with a project demonstrating debugging techniques.
